question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. toy car
B. knife in the hand
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The knife in the hand is being held by the man and is positioned directly in front of him, very close to the camera, while the toy car is on the cake which is further back on the table.
